name: Music Store Simulator
description:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2173600/Beer_Factory__Prologue/




With Music Store Simulator you can lead a musical instruments manufacturing company. Create, sell, earn and reinvest improving and developing your business.

According to your worldwide customers requests you will have to create their dream musical instrument, starting from the assembly work, to the painting and the configuration. The more the customer will be happy with the observance of the deadline, the quality and the budget, the more he will soon place a new order. More customers, more money, more brand growth!



With the profits you will be able to buy more performing tools and unblock additional rooms to expand your atelier and improve the quality of your musical instruments. You will also have the chance to produce your very own instrument, add it to your private collection and one day, perhaps, even sell it online!

The quality of your musical instruments will depend on your experience with every single material, so the more you practice the more you improve.
If you want there are also different classes, focused on every single material, that you can choose and buy to improve your skills and that help you satisfying the most extreme requests of the customers.



But please take a good care of your warehouse! You have to keep it always supplied both with the parts needed to build your instruments and the paintings, glues and tools.
In Music Store Simulator your tools will get old while using them and sometimes you’ll have to replace them, for example buying a better work table to speed up some procedures and reduce the production time.

You can expand your initially small and local brand by achieving reputation and fame worldwide, you will be able to launch your advertising campaign or produce musical instruments for famous artists that will promote your brand during their tours.
Once achieved a certain level of celebrity you will also be able to open branches all over the world and become a worldwide musical instruments producer.
To reach your aim you’ll have to pay special attention to finances and management, supported by a credit system to get a loan or take out a mortgage to expand your business.

Features

  • Graphic design and modelling aimed to reproduce accurately all the details of the musical instruments.
  • More than 40 instruments to create (acoustic and electric guitars, acoustic and electric bass, string instruments and amplifiers).
  • More than 1000 pieces to use, all customizable in materials and finishing.
  • Production of instruments based on specific orders of customers from all over the world.
  • Typical production steps: joint, screwing, gluing.
  • Private collection of the instruments you want to treasure.
  • Realistic timing: painting and glue drying requires different processing times (in the meanwhile will have to progress on other orders).
  • Skills enhancement that will allow you a continuous improving quality of your instruments production.
  • Warehouse management of pieces, paintings, glues and tools.
  • Opportunity to play the musical instruments you created (of course after tuning them!).
  • Growth and development of your studio by adding a new production room, 2 warehouses, a drying room, a painting room and a photography studio (to immortalize your best instruments!).
  • Brand development based on your worldwide customers satisfaction.
  • Opportunity to open new branches in all the different cities where your brand has become popular.
  • Credit System to finance the development of your studio.
  • Customization of the background playlist to listen to your favourite music while playing the game.
